title: King crab, asparagus, garlic and hazelnuts
description: The fresh flavours of early summer come together with some key Japanese ingredients to make an impressive dinner party dish.
ingredients: 40ml/1½fl oz bonito vinegar (available from specialist Japanese suppliers)
10g/¼oz new season garlic, blanched and chopped
10 wild garlic leaves, blanched and chopped
8 new season garlic cloves, peeled and blanched until soft and tender
